item.description:
5K or 10K Road Race to support Neuroblastoma and show support for a little girl. 

Check out these links:

For Race info & registration information:

http://www.prayersforcharlotte.org/events.aspx

For Charlott's story here is their home page:

http://www.prayersforcharlotte.org/default.aspx

 

Race: Sunday, April 10, 2011

Start: 10:00 AM  (arrive early to register and meetup with our group)

Routes: Races begin and end at Granite Grill
703 Granite Street, Braintree

  • 10K Road Race
  • 5K Road Race
  • Wheelchair Division
  • Youth (17 and under) Division
  • 5K Walk

Entry Fees:
$25 Pre-Registration by April 1
$30 Day of Race
Youth Division 17 and under, $20
Long Sleeve T-shirt guaranteed to first 800 Registered Participants
Post-Race Celebration led by Jim Plunkett

Shirt and Number Pickup:
Pre-Registered Runners: Saturday, April 9, 6 pm to 9 pm, at Granite Grill
Race Day Registration: 8 am to 9:30 am at Granite Grill
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the parking lot
item.why: Charlotteâ€™s family & friends have organized this run & walk to raise funds to fight Neuroblastoma. All proceeds from the event will benefit Neuroblastoma research. We hope you will come out to support this event & please, say a prayer for Charlotte.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Run For Charlott 5K or 10K Road Race
